DOC.brief_summary: Superiority multicenter prospective randomize study operative delivery ( instrumental delivery caesarean section ) prophylactic manual rotation case persistent occipital posterior presentation second stage labor compare expectant management . A 15 % reduction operative delivery ( instrumental delivery caesarean section ) attempt prophylactic manual rotation group .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Prophylactic Manual Rotation Persistent Occiput Posterior Presentation During Early Second Stage Labor Reduce Operative Delivery : Prospective Multicenter Randomized Control Trial
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year Singleton pregnancy Term ≥ 37 week gestation Early second stage labor Rupture membranes Persistent occiput posterior position confirm ultrasound Epidural anesthesia Patient agree participate sign consent form Age < 18 year Term < 37 week gestation Vaginal instrumental Delivery maternal contraindication Antecedent perineal injury type IV Sensitive perineum Crohn 's disease vaginal delivery contraindication Instrumental fetal contraindication Non reassure fetal heart impossibility optimal maternal information Known fetal malformation Previous ceaserean section Non cephalic presentation Not affiliate social security
